Back to Robert Schumann

Robert Schumann

Sonata no. 1 in F-sharp minor, op. 11

1833–1835

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 32' 30"

  • 1. Introduzione: Un poco Adagio – Allegro vivace
  • 2. Aria
  • 3. Scherzo e Intermezzo: Allegrissimo – Lento
  • 4. Finale: Allegro un poco maestoso

Recommended editions

  • Gesamtausgabe (Schott) · III/1/2 · RSA 1017 · ed. Michael Beiche
  • Henle · HN 922 · Sämtliche Klavierwerke / Band II · ed. Ernst Herttrich
  • Henle · HN 923 · Sämtliche Klavierwerke / Band II · ed. Ernst Herttrich
  • Henle · HN 337 · ed. Ernst Herttrich

1. Introduzione: Un poco Adagio – Allegro vivace

The extent to which this movement is related to the fandango in A-flat major/F minor (Anh. F15) is unclear.

Duration: 12' 30"

Difficulty: 4.5

2. Aria

This is based on the song An Anna (Anh. M2 no. 7).

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3

3. Scherzo e Intermezzo: Allegrissimo – Lento

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 4

4. Finale: Allegro un poco maestoso

Duration: 11' 30"

Difficulty: 5
